text: Didier Flament (born 4 January 1951) is a French fencer. He won a gold medal in the team foil event at the 1980 Summer Olympics and a bronze in the same event at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:French male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of France Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for France Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in fencing Category:People from Tourcoing Category:Medalists at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Nord (French department)
title: Didier Flament
